about_the_game: Tess Elated is an innovative logic puzzle tour-de-force that will have you addicted from the go! Use your wits against a series of increasingly powerful female professionals who seem to be under some sort of mystical spell. Access the skill trees to unlock new, powerful abilities. Engage in three distinct difficulty levels. Compete on the Steam leader boards against your friends. Complete all 25 achievements. And most importantly - become Elated! With amazing graphics by Sproutsnout and an incredible original soundtrack by Yasushi Kaminishi, of Giga Wing and Mars Matrix fame.

Use your wits against a series of increasingly powerful female professionals who seem to be under some sort of mystical spell. Access the skill trees to unlock new, powerful abilities. Engage in three distinct difficulty levels. Compete on the Steam leader boards against your friends. Complete all 25 achievements. And most importantly - become Elated! With amazing graphics by Sproutsnout and an incredible original soundtrack by Yasushi Kaminishi, of Giga Wing and Mars Matrix fame.
name: Tess Elated Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 or later
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Tess Elated is an addicting Logic Puzzle game where you face off against a series of powerful female professionals. Investigate the diverse cast to discover who or what is influencing their world. Cross the line, and become... Elated!
